name: nltled

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: 'Not less than ' implies 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
